content: --जनः {1} a man, mankind. {2} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon who had assumed the form of a conch-shell, and was slain by Kṛṣṇa. {3} the soul. {4} the five classes of beings; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} gods, men, Gandharvas, serpents and pitṛs. {5} the four primary castes of the Hindus (ब्राह्मण, क्षत्रिय, वैश्य and शूद्र) with the Niṣādas or barbarians as the fifth (<ab>pl.</ab> in these two senses); (for a full exposition see Śārīrabhāṣya on Br. <ls>Br. Sūt. I. 4. 11-13</ls>). (--नी an assemblage of five persons.
